meanings.definition: Resembling a rat in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The small creature had a ratlike tail and whiskers.
meanings.sent2: The dark alley was filled with ratlike creatures scurrying about.
meanings.sent3: The ratlike puppet in the play made the audience chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her sneaky, ratlike movements in the game caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent5: The ratlike features of the mask made it look eerie and unsettling.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to those of a rat.
meanings.sent1: The old man had a ratlike cunning in his eyes.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned building had a ratlike smell of decay and filth.
meanings.sent3: The ratlike scavenger found a hidden treasure in the garbage dump.
meanings.sent4: Her ratlike instincts for survival kicked in during the crisis.
meanings.sent5: The ratlike curiosity of the child led him to explore every nook and cranny.
